channel.title: How do i change how fast the characters in my server level up?
channel.description:
Can someone please help me?!?! Im so confused and im trying to make an economy. I also need help on a client, plus the character level thing. Its a 317 server... Im so confused!!
With much thanks to whoever helps, BANDOS_PK!

item.title: How do i change how fast the characters in my server level up?
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

well runescape is 4 per hit and if you do that you will get 0 players. i suggest about 350 if you dont want too fast training but decent speed

item.source: How do i change how fast the characters in my server level up?

item.title: How do i change how fast the characters in my server level up?
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Open client.java

ctrL+f and search xprates

you’ll see

TotalExp = (double)(AMMOUNTGOESHERE*hitDiff);

Change where it says ammountgoeshere to what ever you want your exp rate to be.

You have to do this multiple times, for every time you see that code.

Read full topic
